channel.title: Smoke - Hern [Experimental Album]
channel.description:
I didn't really try to go for a consistent theme or concept on this album. This is the farthest I have gone so far with this almost entirely sample-based sound I've been working with as of recent. This includes some of my most out-there samples.
Track list: Powerful (2:44) Tomb (5:27) Falter (2:49) Hesitation (0:50) Smoke (30:00) Interlude Type Beat (1:36) Sainthood (8:34)
List of samples (for anybody curious): Yes - Heart of the Sunrise Cuphead OST - Railroad Wrath Justice - Waters Of Nazareth My guitar Death Grips - Government Plates (Not album version, live piano cover on Twitch) Ambient noise from outside of a school Primus - Wynona's Big Brown Beaver Soundgarden - Rusty Cage Rage Against The Machine - Bulls On Parade Weird nonsensical melodies from my way older unpublished music Black Flag - Rise Above (But only the drum intro) Horn section Pantera - Cowboys From Hell "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" song from some strange foreign educational game that was made by the man who made LSD Dream Simulator
[Runtime is 52:02] Album link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/smoke
I hope you people enjoy, it took me a while to feel comfortable releasing this. Constructive criticism is always welcome.

I wanted to challenge myself.

item.title: Smoke - Hern [Experimental Album]
item.dc:creator: Hern-Meridian
item.description:
I didn’t really try to go for a consistent theme or concept on this album. This is the farthest I have gone so far with this almost entirely sample-based sound I’ve been working with as of recent. This includes some of my most out-there samples.

Track list:
Powerful (2:44)
Tomb (5:27)
Falter (2:49)
Hesitation (0:50)
Smoke (30:00)
Interlude Type Beat (1:36)
Sainthood (8:34)

List of samples (for anybody curious):
Yes - Heart of the Sunrise
Cuphead OST - Railroad Wrath
Justice - Waters Of Nazareth
My guitar
Death Grips - Government Plates (Not album version, live piano cover on Twitch)
Ambient noise from outside of a school
Primus - Wynona’s Big Brown Beaver
Soundgarden - Rusty Cage
Rage Against The Machine - Bulls On Parade
Weird nonsensical melodies from my way older unpublished music
Black Flag - Rise Above (But only the drum intro)
Horn section
Pantera - Cowboys From Hell
“The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog” song from some strange foreign educational game that was made by the man who made LSD Dream Simulator

[Runtime is 52:02]
Album link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/smoke

I hope you people enjoy, it took me a while to feel comfortable releasing this. Constructive criticism is always welcome.

Read full topic
